TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MetadataId extends System.Object

Docs.summary: An Id that can be used to identify a metadata instance. If two metadata instances have the same id then they are guaranteed to have the same content. If two metadata instances have different ids, then the contents may or may not be the same. As such, the id is useful as a key in a cache when a client wants to share data for a metadata reference as long as it has not changed.
